Content: The 114th annual celebration of Coconut Island is coming soon. The Five-Color <color=#B58019>Coconut Drink</color> is in high demand. <color=#B58019>Coconut</color> price is expected to rise significantly!
First Mate No. 21 has arrived on our island and needs a large supply of <color=#B58019>Coconuts</color> for her voyage. It might be a good idea to produce <color=#B58019>Coconuts</color> now.
Sailor Noctis has arrived on our island and needs a large supply of <color=#B58019>Wood</color> to repair his ship. We might be able to sell <color=#B58019>Wood</color> for a good price.
Captain Vera needs <color=#B58019>Petroleum</color> to reward her two subordinates and is looking for a supplier. <color=#B58019>Petroleum</color> is expected to be in high demand.
Sophia, a famous trader from Akdilek, predicts that <color=#B58019>Coconut</color> and <color=#B58019>Wood</color> prices will increase to varying degrees in the coming quarters.
